article.headline: Charleston Southern 80, Stetson 64
article.story: CHARLESTON, S.C. -- Jamarco Warren scored 16 points and Kelvin Martin added 15 points and 10 rebounds to lead Charleston Southern to an 80-64 victory over Stetson on Saturday night. Tom Tankelewicz was 4-for-5 on 3-point attempts on his way to scoring 14 points for the Buccaneers (2-1). Warren hit a 3-pointer to give Charleston Southern a 52-49 lead with 9:29 left in the game. Tankelewicz and Jeremy Sexton hit consecutive 3-pointers to give the Buccaneers a 61-54 advantage with 6:49 left. Tankelewicz hit another 3-pointer for a 70-59 lead with 3:42 remaining. Charleston Southern was 8-for-15 from 3-point range (53.3 percent). Martin also had four of Charleston Southern's 11 blocks. A.J. Smith scored 23 points to lead Stetson (1-3), which was only 8-for-35 from the field (22.9 percent) in the first half. Graeme Radford had nine rebounds for the Hatters.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
